mobiles.name: Ancient Guard
mobiles.long_description: The guard awaits your approach and attacks at any moment.
mobiles.description: The Ancient Guard stares codly back at you with watery red eyes.

mobiles.name: Blood Snake
mobiles.long_description: The snake slithers and hides in the blood, waiting to attack you.
mobiles.description: You can barely makeout the shape of this enourmous snake.

mobiles.name: Serpent Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Serpent Vampire is sleeping in his coffin.
mobiles.description:
You see a Serpent Vampire, he must be a grand master at Serpentis. 
His form is huge and powerful, beware.

mobiles.name: insane vampire
mobiles.long_description: An insane vampire stands here ready to fight anyone.
mobiles.description:
It looks back at you. 
He realizes you fear him and approaches.

mobiles.name: ancient vampire toreador her
mobiles.long_description: She is here staring and laughing at you.
mobiles.description: She stares at you, and starts to giggle. Then slaps you across the face.

mobiles.name: cappadocian guardian vampire
mobiles.long_description: The almighty brute of the Cappadocian stands here.
mobiles.description:
The vampire brute of the Cappadocian stands here guarding his hallway from 
intruders. Beware he likes to stake other vampires!

mobiles.name: Tremere Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Tremere Guardian Vampire stands here guarding his halls.
mobiles.description: The Tremere Guardian Vampire stands here guarding his halls.

mobiles.name: Malkavian Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire runs around looking for anything to kill.
mobiles.description:
You stare face to face with an insane maniac in a straight jacket. 
You gaze into his eyes and observe total madness.

mobiles.name: Death Mage
mobiles.long_description: A Death mage stands here. He has no visible face to give you an expression.
mobiles.description:
The mages notices you but does not move, or care. 
He stands there praying to the evil gods. He seems very powerful. 
As you turn away he touches a rat and it withers and falls to 
the floor and decays in seconds. Beware...

mobiles.name: Brujah Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire stands here poised to attack anyone.
mobiles.description: As you look at him, he glares back and commands you to die!

mobiles.name: Toreador Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Toreador Vampire beams a smile at you while carving a wooden figure.
mobiles.description:
The vampire smiles at you and walks over to shake your hand. 
Beware though it is rumored he is also homosexual!

mobiles.name: Gangrel Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire stands here picking his teeth with his harpoon.
mobiles.description: The vampire smirks at you, and comes forward to bash you.

mobiles.name: Toreador Vampire him
mobiles.long_description: He stands here ready to plunge you to death!
mobiles.description:
The Toreador Vampire sits quiet. He is a grand master with his wrench, 
watch out.

mobiles.name: Tremere Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The powerhouse vampire stands here.
mobiles.description: A mighty Tremere Vampire looks at you back and examines you.

mobiles.name: Cappadocian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire stands deadly silent.
mobiles.description: The vampire sits here examining your body parts.

mobiles.name: Nosferatu Guardian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Nosferatu Guardian Vampire stands here in complete training.
mobiles.description:
The Nosferatu Guardian Vampire is completely unaware of your 
presence for he is training to become a Grand Master vampire.

mobiles.name: Cappadocian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire sits poised ready to attack at any moment!
mobiles.description: The vampire sees you and attacks!

mobiles.name: Cappadocian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Cappdocian Vampire, leader of the Black Hand, stands here.
mobiles.description: He notices you and immediately attacks!

mobiles.name: Cappadocian Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Grand Master stares at you with dark cold black eyes.
mobiles.description:
The Grand Master of Cappadocian vampires stands here shrouded 
by a dark eerie cloak, the likes of which you have never seen before.
He stares at you with pitch black eyes.

mobiles.name: Tremere Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Tremere Vampire sits upon his chair mixing magical potions.
mobiles.description: The vampire moves quickly around the room trying to make the perfet magical potion.

mobiles.name: Tremere Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The vampire stands here with a magical wand.
mobiles.description: The vampire is here ready to zap anyone with his magical wand!

mobiles.name: Tremere Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Tremere Grand Master Vampire sits upon his thrown.
mobiles.description: The Tremere Grand Master Vampire sits here awaiting the new magical findings of his clan.

mobiles.name: Lone Wolf beast werewolf man
mobiles.long_description: You stand before a huge beast, half man and half werewolf!
mobiles.description:
The Lone Wolf stands here half man and half werewolf. 
Where did he come from? 
You've never seen a werewolf before! 
You ponder the question...

mobiles.name: Shrine Gargoyle
mobiles.long_description: The gargoyle is perched above the door, completely stone.
mobiles.description: The gargoyle is perched above the door awaiting to attack anyone who tries to enter!

mobiles.name: LaMagra
mobiles.long_description: LaMagra, the old ancient blood god rests here.
mobiles.description:
LaMagra is floating 10 feet above the blood floor. 
He is soaked in blood... He seems completely unaware of you, 
but as you approach he sits up and attacks!

mobiles.name: Malkavian Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Malkavian Vampire runs around all crazy like!
mobiles.description: The Malkavian Vampire runs around all crazy like, and attacks you!

mobiles.name: Malkavian Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Malkavian Grand Master Vampire sits upon his throne.
mobiles.description: Malkavian Grand Master Vampire sits upon his throne staring at you cross-eyed.

mobiles.name: Nosferatu Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Nosferatu Vampire hides from you as he awaits your attack!
mobiles.description: The Nosferatu Vampire hides from you as he awaits your attack!

mobiles.name: Nosferatu Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Nosferatu Grand Master Vampire hides behind his great throne.
mobiles.description:
The Nosferatu Grand Master Vampire hides behind his great throne, 
awaiting to attack anyone who dares to bother him.

mobiles.name: Toreador Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The great Toreador Grand Master Vampire sits before you.
mobiles.description: The great Toreador Grand Master Vampire sits before you with an eriee rose in her hand.

mobiles.name: Brujah Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Brujah Vampire stands here ready to attack you on sight!
mobiles.description: The Brujah Vampire stands here ready to attack you on sight!

mobiles.name: Brujah Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Brujah Grand Master Vampire sits upon his throne.
mobiles.description:
The Brujah Grand Master Vampire blood has
blood dripping from his mouth from his last
victim!

mobiles.name: Gangrel Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Gangrel Vampire wanders around looking for something to slay!
mobiles.description: The Gangrel Vampire wanders around looking for something to slay!

mobiles.name: Gangrel Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Gangrel Grand Master Vampire sits upon his throne.
mobiles.description: The Gangrel Grand Master Vampire sits here upon his throne eating an oreo cookie!

mobiles.name: Ventrue Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Ventrue vampire looks for something to kill.
mobiles.description:
The Ventrue vampire looks like he wants to
kill you.

mobiles.name: Ventrue Grand Master Vampire
mobiles.long_description: The Ventrue Grand Master Vampire sits on his throne.
mobiles.description:
The Ventrue Grand Master Vampire sits here
wondering what you want.

objects.name: Broad Sword
objects.description: A big dull looking sword lies in the dirt.

objects.name: Serpentis Ring
objects.description: A glowing ring lies here gleaming but coverd in blood.

objects.name: Mad Sword
objects.description: Mad's hand crafted sword called Mad lies here in a dark eerie glow.

objects.name: Jynx Shield
objects.description: A shield lies here with a wierd etching in it, no one can read it but Jynx herself.

objects.name: Stake
objects.description: A silver stake lies here on the ground, useless against vampires.

objects.name: Sex Change Pill
objects.description: A sex change pill lies here.

objects.name: Straight Jacket
objects.description: A straight jacket lies here waiting to consume its next user.

objects.name: Coiled Staff
objects.description: A coiled withered staff lies here.

objects.name: Sword of Command
objects.description: A powerful sword lies here, ready to posses and dominate its next user.

objects.name: Magical Light
objects.description: A magical light lies here, it looks hand-crafted.

objects.name: harpoon of Destruction
objects.description: A large harpoon lies here, twiching with power.

objects.name: Wrench
objects.description: A plumbers wrench lies here.

objects.name: Pig Stick
objects.description: A Pig Sticker lies here.

objects.name: Helm Of Wimps
objects.description: A steel helm lies here, its dull and eerie.

objects.name: Wooden Sword
objects.description: A wooden sword lies here, good for training.

objects.name: Cape of Fear
objects.description: A cape lies here, it makes you want to kill anyone who uses the mask.

objects.name: BlackHands
objects.description: A pair of black gloves here glaze over, as you notice its deep black transparent color.

objects.name: Pale shrouds
objects.description: A cover of some sort lies here out of sight, you wonder what powerful creature made it.

objects.name: Big Mouth
objects.description: A big mouth on a stick lies here ready to suck you to death.

objects.name: Holy Cross
objects.description: A holy cross lies here from the holy vampire Faith.

objects.name: Hamburger
objects.description: A juicy Hamburger, the finest in all the land, lies here.

objects.name: Glaive of Thieves
objects.description: A Glaive rests here, not of a Minotaur, you wonder where it came from.

objects.name: Gargoyle Claw
objects.description: A sharp 10 inch claw lies here.

objects.name: Sword of Blood
objects.description: A huge sword lies here, bleeding on the ground.

objects.name: finger bone skeleton key
objects.description: A bone from a skeleton lies here

extra_descr_data.description:
As you stare at them intently, memories
from your youth come to mind.
These are Glyphs of opening.
You have found the master key to these halls.

The finger bones of some long dead mortal
have been crafted and enchanted, so that
they do not come apart, even though the
gristle has long since decomposed.
It has several strange glyphs on its
surface.

rooms.name: A dusty hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a dusty hallway, you see no foot prints, 
no sign of anything or anyone being here for centuries.
Stone stairs lead up into the darkness.

rooms.name: A dusty hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in front of a small ornate door dripping with blood, 
but yet spider webs all over.

rooms.name: A dusty shaft.
rooms.description: You are standing in a room with a large pit and a ladder going down into the darkness.

rooms.name: A long ladder.
rooms.description: You are decending on a long wooden ladder.

rooms.name: A long ladder
rooms.description: You continue down the ladder.

rooms.name: A long ladder.
rooms.description: You continue down the ladder.

rooms.name: End of the Ladder
rooms.description:
You reach the end of the ladder and see you are 
walking in a pool of blood that runs everywhere.

rooms.name: Blood filled hallway.
rooms.description: You see blood pooring down a small crevice.

rooms.name: Blood Room
rooms.description: You see blood pooring down a deep slipery crevice.

rooms.name: Blood Bath
rooms.description:
You see strange things moving in the blood, 
you stand 2 foot deep in blood. 
You try and resist in frenzy.

rooms.name: Blood Bath
rooms.description:
You come to a door covered in blood, 
with blood oozing out of the cracks in the door. 
Do you dare to open it?

rooms.name: Blood Bath
rooms.description:
You see strange things moving in the blood, 
you stand 2ft deep in blood. 
You try and resist in frenzy.

rooms.name: Blood Bath
rooms.description:
You see strange things moving in the blood, 
you stand 2ft deep in blood. 
You try and resist in frenzy.

rooms.name: Blood Bath
rooms.description:
You see strange things moving in the blood, 
you stand 2ft deep in blood. 
You try and resist in frenzy.

rooms.name: Bloody Serpent's Lair
rooms.description:
You stand in 4ft of blood before a giant serpent. 
You shiver and suffer at its enourmous size.

rooms.name: The Mad Circle
rooms.description:
You stand in a room with four exits. 
Surprisingly there is NO BLOOD HERE. 
This place could drive any kindred INSANE!

rooms.name: The Mad Circle
rooms.description:
You stand in this room and you get a funny feeling of deja-vu? 
Have I been here before?

rooms.name: Tremere Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Tremere. 
You notice a strange magic glow in the blood 
that pours down these halls, your spine tingles.

rooms.name: Cappadocian Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Cappadocian. 
You look at the blood that pours down these halls 
and you notice it is pure black. 
Your feet begin to numb as you stand in the blood.

rooms.name: Malkavian Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in a pure white padded hallway. 
The blood runes bright red along the ground. 
You notice the blood does not stain the white walls. 
Your head begins to spin as you hear the sounds of Bethovens 9th symphony. 
You know the powerful Malkavian's must be around.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter a blood filled room. 
You puke as you smell the stench of the Nosferatu vampires. 
The blood makes you woozy as it is green in color but thick as molases.

rooms.name: The Mad Circle
rooms.description:
You stand in another room. Except its diffrent. 
There is a man standing in the middle. 
He is surrounded by a circle of candles praying. 
There is no blood here except on the mans cloak.

rooms.name: Brujah Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a room full of fresh blood. 
The blood seems of Brujah nature. 
You stand here in this blood and feel the rage of the Brujah brothers. 
The blood practically makes you frenzy!

rooms.name: Toreador Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in 2 inches of weak blood. 
The blood is thinned and weak. 
You see intracately made ornaments and paintings on the walls.

rooms.name: The End of the Mad Circle
rooms.description:
You stand at the last room of the Mad circle. 
Johan kneels here in prayer. 
He is aware of everything and can sense your approach. 
The room is filled with hair. 
Not human hair, nor any kind of animal. 
You wonder where this unhuman hair came from.

rooms.name: Ventrue Hallways.
rooms.description:
You enter the Ventrue Hallways and notice there is no blood at all here. 
You ponder where are the Ventrue vampires? 
Are they hiding in seclusion? Or have they been wiped out?

rooms.name: Gangrel Hallways
rooms.description:
You step into a hallway with blood running thick and potent. 
You see oreo cookies and a glass of milk on the counter. 
The blood of the gangrel makes you stop dead in your tracks from fear.

rooms.name: Toreador Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in 2 inches of weak blood. 
The blood is thinned and weak. 
You see intracately made ornaments and paintings on the walls.

rooms.name: Tremere Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Tremere. 
You notice a strange magic glow in the blood 
that pours down these halls, your spine tingles.

rooms.name: Cappadocian Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Cappadocian. 
You look at the blood that pours down these halls 
and you notice it is pure black. 
Your feet begin to numb as you stand in the blood.

rooms.name: Cappadocian Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Cappadocian. 
You look at the blood that pours down these halls 
and you notice it is pure black. 
Your feet begin to numb as you stand in the blood.

rooms.name: Cappadocian Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Cappadocian. 
You look at the blood that pours down these halls 
and you notice it is pure black. 
Your feet begin to numb as you stand in the blood. 
You stand before a prison cell door. 
The blood seems as tho is comming from the other side.

rooms.name: Cappadocian Throne Room
rooms.description:
The blood here is deeper and blacker than before. 
Your body grows cold and numb. 
You notice in the shadows the great Cappdadocian Grand Master Vampire.

rooms.name: Tremere Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Tremere. 
You notice a strange magic glow in the blood 
that pours down these halls, your spine tingles.

rooms.name: Tremere Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a hallway decorated with pictorals 
of the struggles and battles or the Tremere. 
You notice a strange magic glow in the blood 
that pours down these halls, your spine tingles.

rooms.name: Tremere Throne Room
rooms.description:
You stand in a room filled with blood pouring 
up out of a Cauldron, it is unhuman. 
You notice all the magic scrolls and staves of 
the Tremere Grand Master Vampire. 
There is an altar here for blood rituals.

rooms.name: Malkavian Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in a pure white padded hallway. 
The blood runes bright red along the ground. 
You notice the blood does not stain the white walls. 
Your head begins to spin as you hear the sounds of Bethovens 9th symphony. 
You know the powerful Malkavian's must be around.

rooms.name: Blood Shrine Entrance
rooms.description:
You come to an ornate door, blood flows 
strongly through the cracks and the bars of the door. 
The blood here is as thick as you have ever seen in your life!

rooms.name: Blood Shrine
rooms.description:
You stand in a room filled with an ocean of blood. 
Surprisingly you do not sink, the blood is as strong 
as concrete where you step. There are many ornate 
carvings and symbols in the cylinder shaped room. 
There is something in the middle of the room watch out!

rooms.name: Swimming through blood.
rooms.description: You are swimming through a thick dense lake of blood.

rooms.name: Swimming through blood.
rooms.description:
You are swimming through a thick dense lake of blood. 
You see light at the bottom of the blood.

rooms.name: Malkavian Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in a pure white padded hallway. 
The blood runes bright red along the ground. 
You notice the blood does not stain the white walls. 
Your head begins to spin as you hear the sounds of Bethovens 9th symphony. 
You know the powerful Malkavian's must be around.

rooms.name: Malkavian Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in a pure white padded hallway. 
The blood runes bright red along the ground. 
You notice the blood does not stain the white walls. 
Your head begins to spin as you hear the sounds of Bethovens 9th symphony. 
You know the powerful Malkavian's must be around.

rooms.name: Malkavian Throne Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a pure white padded room. 
The Grand Master Vampire is sitting here cross-eyed.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter a blood filled room. 
You puke as you smell the stench of the Nosferatu vampires. 
The blood makes you woozy as it is green in color but thick as molases.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter a blood filled room. 
You puke as you smell the stench of the Nosferatu vampires. 
The blood makes you woozy as it is green in color but thick as molases.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter a blood filled room. 
You puke as you smell the stench of the Nosferatu vampires. 
The blood makes you woozy as it is green in color but thick as molases.

rooms.name: Nosferatu Throne Room
rooms.description:
You stand before the great Noseferatu Vampire, 
the ugliest thing you've ever seen!

rooms.name: Toreador Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in 2 inches of weak blood. 
The blood is thinned and weak. 
You see intracately made ornaments and paintings on the walls.

rooms.name: Toreador Hallways
rooms.description:
You are standing in 2 inches of weak blood. 
The blood is thinned and weak. 
You see intracately made ornaments and paintings on the walls.

rooms.name: Toreador Throne Room
rooms.description:
You stand before the Toreadoran Grand Master Vampire who 
elegantly sits upon his throne and awaits a challenger!

rooms.name: Brujah Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a room full of fresh blood. 
The blood seems of Brujah nature. 
You stand here in this blood and feel the rage of the Brujah brothers. 
The blood practically makes you frenzy!

rooms.description:
You stand in a room full of fresh blood. 
The blood seems of Brujah nature. 
You stand here in this blood and feel the rage of the Brujah brothers. 
The blood practically makes you frenzy!

rooms.name: Brujah Hallways
rooms.description:
You stand in a room full of fresh blood. 
The blood seems of Brujah nature. 
You stand here in this blood and feel the rage of the Brujah brothers. 
The blood practically makes you frenzy!

rooms.name: Brujah Throne Room
rooms.description:
You stand before the great Brujah Grand Master vampire! Never before have you
seen such a mighty and powerful warrior.

rooms.name: Gangrel Hallways
rooms.description:
You step into a hallway with blood running thick and potent. 
You see oreo cookies and a glass of milk on the counter. 
The blood of the gangrel makes you stop dead in your tracks from fear.

You see oreo cookies and a glass of milk on the counter. 
The blood of the gangrel makes you stop dead in your tracks from fear.

You see oreo cookies and a glass of milk on the counter. 
The blood of the gangrel makes you stop dead in your tracks from fear.

rooms.name: Gangrel Throne Room
rooms.description: You stand before the Gangrel Grand Master Vampire who sits upon his throne waiting to fight you!

rooms.name: Ventrue Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter the Ventrue Hallways and notice there is no blood at all here. 
You ponder where are the Ventrue vampires? Are they hiding in seclusion? 
Or have they been wiped out?

rooms.description:
You enter the Ventrue Hallways and notice there is no blood at all here. 
You ponder where are the Ventrue vampires? Are they hiding in seclusion? 
Or have they been wiped out?

rooms.name: Ventrue Hallways
rooms.description:
You enter the Ventrue Hallways and notice there is no blood at all here. 
You ponder where are the Ventrue vampires? Are they hiding in seclusion? 
Or have they been wiped out?

rooms.name: Ventrue Throne Room
rooms.description:
You stand before a huge throne made of the purest gold, set with Diamonds,
Sapphires and Rubies that are larger than your hand. The seat is vacant, and 
there is noone to challenge you for your trespass.
